column5: A new update at the top of the page.   Art
Thanks for passing on Jackie's update Art! Jack's a tough 'ol bugger.. he'll be back carving in no time.
Thoughts are definitely with Jack.  Hope for the best.
Thanks for posting that update Art...saves me sending a bunch of e-mails...

Jack did the very same thing for me - possibly the same year.   Walked me down to his boat and handed over a handful of jig heads.  We still use them and Patsy just loves them.   A very kind and generous man that I hope he receives in return, many times over, in these times.   Still prayin' for ya bud.

just a little up date for you and if I have missed anyone please let them know, I dont know where Jack's list is for sending multiple emails, he has had his first radiation on Mon. in oshawa he is to have five all this week each day rest day on thurs, for holidays! for drs. then the last one mon.  he is really in good spirits as he has movement in his fingers on the left hand he was so excited yesterday when he moved them, its a start, and that was before the radiation, the Dr. is not going to do any kind of surgery, too dangerous he said we can do more damage so we will just do the radiation and get the inflammation down take the pressure off, so thats what our week is going to be very busy up and down to oshawa, the best part is I can go with him on every trip and jack is happy about that too. so all in all things are getting better each day, think of us in your prayers, take care Love Jackie Jack and Teddy   If anyone would like to drop a note: Jack and Jackies and Teddy  Email address is  [email protected]  Nanook or Jacks e mail.  The OFC community.
Thanks for the note Art...
our thoughts are with him
Believe in the power.  Prayers and thoughts are with you Jack.  SOMETHING GOOD IS HAPPENING.  Thanks for the update Art.
Thanks guys.  I had the pleasure to meet Jack at my first OFC GTG. I will certainly offer up my prayers to Jack and his family.
My thoughts are with him and his family during this time.
Thoughts and prayers from my family to the both of them. Leechman
Art, you're a gem.  Keep positive thoughts Jack and Jackie.  I'm sending my positive energy your way.  Joey
My prayers are with him
Prayers are with you. Be well my friend.

Some of you got this e-mail a little while ago...  Further to Jackies news this morning...I arrived at their place At 02:00 pm just in time to see an ambulance in the driveway getting ready to transport Jack down to the hospital in Peterborough...All I got to say to him was" Hi and take care Pal "... His doctor there wants him in the hospital while they transport him back and forth to the hospital in Oshawa for his radiation treatments so that they can keep an eye on him and monitor his condition... Luckily a bed came available this morning...just as well as in my opinion Jackie is running out of strength to get Jack in and out of their vehicle...she has been a brick up to this latest set-back...I stayed with her and talked for an hour after Jack left...She is going to take their dog Teddy down to her sister's place south of Bobcaygeon then after she goes to see Jack she will stay at her sister's tonight...  Jackie printed off all the e-mails he received so far and will deliver them to him...  Keep them in your thoughts and prayers...  Thanks Beans   Jack did post that he has cancer quite a while ago and this latest set-back is that he suffered a stroke last week denying him use of his left side...X-rays shows he has a couple of brain tumors that they hope to shrink by radiation...Let's hope it works for him...He has been a good friend  and fishing partner to a bunch of us...  Thanks for posting Art...I couldn't find the words...
Norm thanks for the update, best of luck to your friend  Consider it done Art, hopefully the medical treatments will work for  Nanook

I find it amazing how news like this about someone i've never met can make me sad.Its the spirit of community that allows all of us to feel close to one another.I will most definately ask my higher power to pay him a visit and give him what he needs to beat this.Stay Positive Nanook.You are in my thoughts.
Thanks for the update Norm.  I just sent off a nice long email to Jack and Jackie.  Hope I don't bore them to tears  Joey
Get well soon Jack, all the best to you and your lady.
My thoughts and prayers go out them at this difficult time.Keep the faith and fight the fight.
Jack and Jackie know that they have always been in my and J's prayers and will continue to be. Please be well my friends.
I also express my hopes and thoughts to Jack.  I have been in the chat room with him numerous occasions a couple of years ago. They were always a good time.  Am hoping for the best.

The 1st time I ever met Jack in person was up at Lakair a couple years back. He came over and introduced himself and handed me a bag of lures. Said they were too big for what he needed and I could probably use them for muskies.  Another time before that, I posted here that I needed some plexiglass for a project and was surprised at how expensive the stuff was. Within a few minutes I had a PM from Jack saying that he had enough for what I need and to come on up and get it...no charge.  That's just the kinda guy Jack is.

For those who wish to send an e mail or send a photo his E mail address is  [email protected]  Jackie will be printing them off the internet and bringing them to him while he is in the hospital.  I am proud to know so many generous people who have taken the time to wish both Jackie and Jack the best in prayers and deeds.   Art
My thoughts and prayers are with Jack and his wife. I've never met him but feel I got to know hime from when he was a regular poster a little while back. Get well!!!
Sorry I missed this I hope all goes well for Jack.. He is a great person this is for sure.. Fight it my Friend.. We know you can do it.. Jackie tell him we are all pulling for him...

I am pretty sure the view from the hospital doesn't look like this... so here is a pic for you, Jack, to look along the rails of your life and cherish all the beauty that your eyes have seen.  God bless
best of luck to the both of you guys
